text: Nikolai Ivanovich Kozin (; born 27 December 1955) is a Russian football coach and a former player. ==External links== * Category:1955 births Category:People from Gulkevichsky District Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Volga Nizhny Novgorod players Category:FC Akhmat Grozny players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian football managers Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod managers Category:Russian Premier League managers Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan managers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Khimik Dzerzhinsk players
title: Nikolai Kozin
